controller_namespace.description: The namespace the controller is running in.

gitlab.description: If set to true the provider will create a merge request from source branch to target branch. This is currently supported for Gitlab.

source_branch.description: Name of the branch to be used. If the branch does not exist it will be created.

target_branch.description: Name of the branch that should be merged to. Gitlab value must be set to true in order to create a merge request.

token.description: Token to be used for the basic auth.

username.description: Username to be used for the basic auth.

block.description: Git repository credentials to where the sealed secret should be stored.

client_certificate.description: PEM-encoded client certificate for TLS authentication.

client_key.description: PEM-encoded client certificate key for TLS authentication.

cluster_ca_certificate.description: PEM-encoded root certificates bundle for TLS authentication.

host.description: The hostname (in form of URI) of Kubernetes master.

data.description: Key/value pairs to populate the secret. The value will be base64 encoded

filepath.description: The filepath in the Git repository. Including the filename itself and extension

name.description: name of the secret, must be unique

public_key_hash.description: The public key hashed to detect if the public key changes.

string_data.description: Key/value pairs to populate the secret.

data.description: Key/value pairs to populate the secret. The value will be base64 encoded

name.description: name of the secret, must be unique

type.description: The secret type (ex. Opaque). Default type is Opaque.

yaml_content.description: The produced sealed secret yaml file.

block.description: Creates a sealed secret and store it in yaml_content.
